00023 BEHAVIOR_STATUS DestroyAllNearbyProjectiles::execute(void* agent)
00024 {
00025         cout << "destroying nearby projectiles" << endl;
00026 
00027         const GameObjectList* objects = ws->getAllGameObjects();
00028         ConstGameObjectIter iter;
00029         for (iter = objects->begin(); iter!=objects->end(); iter++)
00030         {
00031                 if ((*iter)->faction != PROJECTILE_FACTION)
00032                         continue;
00033 
00034                 float distance = ws->distanceBetween((GameObject*) agent,*iter);
00035                 if (distance < 200)
00036                         ws->deleteObject(*iter);
00037         }
00038         return BT_SUCCESS;
00039 }
